result.execSummary:
The defendant Kevin J Butler was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Kevin J Butler is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Kevin J Butler was found guilty of Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).
  • Kevin J Butler was found guilty of Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Each ct concur. W/H Adjudication on ct 1. If successfull on probation, no new crimes or charges rising to probable cause or ATR's, ct 1 will be dismissed.

miscConds.notes: $443  to be collected by the Dept of Corrections.  Court financial obligations shall be paid at the rate of 25% of the prison wages and work release funds.  Restitution shall be paid pursuant to separate court order.
Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample.  Any other conditions DOC, Probation/Parole Department may impose.
$243  to be collected by the Dept of Corrections.
All other conditions are the same as count 2.
